attributes.action: prevent the chancellor Gordon Brown from taking up the premership without first instigating a referendum on whether a general election should be held
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rise to power and ultimate authority without legitmate hegemony of the population is by definition a coup d'etat. It is our right as citizens of a democratic country to elect a leader and thereby not have one enforced upon us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
